Class PrettyPrint

  • java.lang.Object
    • PrettyPrint

  • public class PrettyPrint
extends java.lang.Object
    Recieves a source code file and indents according to Allman Style

        public java.lang.String stripContents(java.lang.String filename)
        Read in file and store contents into a String. Go through the String and remove all tabs and newlines.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file that the user inputs as a command line argument
        Returns:
        The large one line String with all the code, not formatted

        Returns:
